snippet: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu urged Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on Sunday to "tear up" his pact with Hamas, saying Israel would not take part in Middle East peace talks with a Palestinian government backed by the Islamist group...

headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Tells Abbas to 'Tear Up' Pact With Hamas
headline.main: Netanyahu Tells Abbas to 'Tear Up' Pact With Hamas

lead_paragraph: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu urged Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on Sunday to "tear up" his pact with Hamas, saying Israel would not take part in Middle East peace talks with a Palestinian government backed by the Islamist group.
